recipe.title: Strawberry-Rhubarb Salad with Mint and Hazelnuts
ingredients: 2 rhubarb stalks, thinly sliced on the diagonal
1 tablespoon Cointreau or fresh orange juice
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°. Toast hazelnuts on a rimmed baking sheet, tossing occasionally, until golden brown, 8–10 minutes. Let cool, then chop.

Meanwhile, toss rhubarb, sugar, Cointreau, and lemon juice in a medium bowl. Let sit until rhubarb is slightly softened and releases its juices, about 30 minutes. Toss with strawberries, mint, and hazelnuts.
